Didn't seem to work for me (I already had Tversity 1.9.3 installed and running and just threw this over the top and nothing happened looks the same and still says "Go Pro" & "That feature is available only in Pro"
Same for me.. It says Go Pro

worked for me. make sure you have the right install folder, right click on desktop icon and select open file location. thats where the copy me folder goes. make sure you open both folders to copy & paste. (open the copy me folder, and select all & copy) then paste into install folder and click yes for any merge/overwrite files. and you should be good
